title: game crash
body:
My game crashed after loading screen, i get into game and it freezes my whole computer, it never use to do this. I thought maybe the files were corrupted so i re installed the game, still doing the same thing. i have a brand new laptop with windows 10. and i wasnt having this issue before.
i can run other games like cs go with no problem so its not like league is to much of a game for my laptop to handle. what is the issue here.

replies.body: When you got your new laptop, did you update to the most recent version of Windows 10?  There may be a problem with the Xbox game bar that's causing the game to freeze for some players.  As a first step, disable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  This should get you fixed up, but let me know!
